ClientServer Classes Compound Members

Here is a list of all documented class members with links to the classes they belong to:
  • attachServerName() : Server
  • Client() : Client
  • connectToServer() : Client
  • detachServerName() : Server
  • doMessageLoop() : Server
  • getServerName() : Server, Client
  • receiveMessage() : Server
  • receiveMessageFromAnybody() : Server
  • replyMessage() : Server
  • sendMessage() : Client
  • sendMultiMessage() : Client
  • serveMessage() : Server
  • Server() : Server
  • ~Client() : Client
  • ~Server() : Server
